attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are being discriminated against as we are not allowed to train pistol shooting in certain parts of the UK Channel islands isle of Man and Northern Ireland excluded All we ask for is to be allowed under the strict conditions before 1997 which we all obeyed This is to allow the pistol shooters to get up to scratch before the 2012 Olympics

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/TargetPistols/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
